headline: Is Mondelez (MDLZ) Pricing Reflect Its Recent Share Gains And Cash Flow Outlook
summary: If you are wondering whether Mondelez International is fairly priced or offering value right now, this article will help you make sense of the numbers behind the share price. The stock last closed at US$62.59, with returns of 4.3% over 7 days, 9.4% over 30 days, 16.7% year to date, 6.2% over 1 year, 1.5% over 3 years and 30.7% over 5 years. Recent coverage around Mondelez has focused on its position as a large global snacks business and the way it continues to allocate capital between brand...
